FuncDef:
The netstream record ipv6 command creates an IPv6 flexible flow statistics template or displays the view of an existing IPv6 flexible flow statistics template.
The undo netstream record ipv6 command deletes a specified IPv6 flexible flow statistics template. The netstream record ipv6 command creates an IPv6 flexible flow statistics template or displays the view of an existing IPv6 flexible flow statistics template. The undo netstream record ipv6 command deletes a specified IPv6 flexible flow statistics template. By default, no flexible flow statistics template is applied to an interface.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view,Eth-Trunk interface view,Sub-interface view,Interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the flexible flow statistic template.
The record-name must already exist.

ExtraInfo:
After a flexible flow statistics template is configured, run the command to apply the template to an interface.
The interface then aggregates flows based on the configured aggregation keywords, collects flow statistics, and exports aged flows to the NSC.
